name: AR Zombie Hunter
description:
Here comes the Augmented reality game which you never played before. Zombie Eliminator AR is a augmented reality game where you have to find and shoot deadly zombies around your real world. Be aware !! They are thirsty for blood, hijack your body, disable your immune system,They can be any where like in your kitchen, bathroom, library, school office any where into the real world.

Join Trainers across the globe who are discovering Zombie as they explore the world around them.

Black zombie, Fat zombie, Strong zombie, thirsty zombie, and many other Zombies have been discovered!

Now’s your chance to discover and kill the Poke zombie all around you—so get your shoes on, step outside, and explore the world.

You can play  Zombie Eliminator AR anywhere and anytime.

Lost of zombies are out there, and you need to find them. As you walk around a neighbourhood, your smartphone will vibrate when there’s a Poke Zombie nearby. Take aim and shoot at them !!… You’ll have to stay alert,it might kill you !! Poke Zombie GO AR game is using latest technology of augmented reality. 

Certain Poke Zombie appear near their native environment—look for Water-type Poke Zombie by lakes and oceans.

Catching, hatching, evolving, and more

As you level up, you’ll be able to kill more-powerful Poke Zombie to increase your experience and skill..

It’s time to get moving—your real-life adventures await!. Kill this Poke Zombie or be the part of it. The choice is yours
